channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Cliff, Vehicle; INC#0906; 02:03PM; 2562 W El Rosa Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NTCD9s; Glassell Park; Firefighters located the vehicle which went down the hillside approximately 200' and came to rest (in a stable position) in the backyard of a home. The patient is not trapped and is alert/conscious at this time. Firefighter/paramedics will assess the patient for any required treatment/transport. There is no damage to the structure. One task force and rescue ambulance will handle. Any further questions are referred to LAPD Inc# 2190.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO1 AO2 BC2 BC5 E203 E250 E3 E55 EM11 H1 H7 HA1 HA7 HR3 RA3 RA55 RA850 RH114 T3 T50 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0750; 12:39PM; 1209 W 56th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DgKcC0; Vermont-Slauson; KNOCKDOWN: 30 firefighters extinguished the fire in 25 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters conducted vertical ventilation and coordinated hand lines working from above and below the attic while additional units performed salvage operations to protect the belongings in the home. Their actions contained the fire to the attic, preventing it from spreading down into the living space. There were no other structures exposed or damaged. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E233 E266 E57 E66 RA266 RA866 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0750; 12:14PM; 1209 W 56th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3DgKcC0; Vermont-Slauson; One story, single family dwelling with heavy, pressurized smoke showing from the attic. An additional task force requested and is enroute. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E233 E266 E57 E66 RA266 RA866 T33 T66; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1224; 05:13PM; 6554 W Quinton Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OdwCWr; #Tujunga; As firefighters arrived, the single-family home was already taking exterior damage. First arriving crews quickly prioritized the home and kept the flames from running through the house. It took the first 20 firefighters 22 minutes to extinguish the fully-involved detached garage. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC14 BC2 CM20 CM22 CM40 CM42 E24 E274 E289 E298 E55 E89 EM14 RA74 T74 T89 T98; CH8; 12 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1224; 04:51PM; 6554 W Quinton Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3OdwCWr; #Tujunga; Detached garage with heavy fire showing, threatening a nearby home. Offensive mode.; FS 74; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 BC2 E24 E274 E298 E55 E89 RA74 T74 T98; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Knockdown; INC#0118; 01:44AM; 11630 W Vanowen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Oe6nyW; North Hollywood; Firefighters arrived to find a one-story single-family home, in the framing stages, with heavy fire showing, exposing a neighboring commercial building to intense heat. It took 49 firefighters 21 minutes (2:05am) to extinguish the flames, and limit the damage to the nearby commercial building. No reported injuries.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC10 BC14 CM40 CM42 E102 E239 E260 E278 E289 E60 E77 EA1 EM14 RA60 RA889 RA89 T39 T60 T78 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Knockdown; INC#0127; 01:56AM; 5945 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/44IWpLE; #VermontSlauson; Firefighters found a one-story commercial with heavy fire showing at the site of a previous burn. It took 30 firefighters 11 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E21 E233 E266 E33 RA33 RA833 SQ21 T33 T66; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1522; 06:45PM; 6512 N Agnes Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rt5Yjl; #NorthHollywood; Firefighters responded to find a detached garage to the rear of a residential property with heavy fire showing. Flames spread to the home on the adjacent property to the rear, but firefighters quickly extinguished the flames to limit the damage to the exposed home. It took 30 firefighters 20 minutes to fully extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E102 E239 E260 E278 E289 E39 E60 E89 EA1 RA39 RA89 T39 T60 T78 T89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1522; 06:25PM; 6512 N Agnes Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3rt5Yjl; #NorthHollywood; Well-involved garage fire to the rear of a single-family home, exposing a neighboring home to flames.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC14 E260 E289 E60 E89 RA39 RA89 T60 T89; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Grass Fire - Now Out; INC#0763; 12:15PM; NB 5 Fwy x 118 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/37VGQVY; #MissionHills; Firefighters were summoned to reports of a rubbish fire on the side of the Northbound 5 Freeway, near the 118 Freeway interchange. Fire spread to the nearby grass and consumed approximately 1.5 acres. This area is fully contained by the surrounding roads, and there are no structures or personal property threatened. It took 22 firefighters 43 minutes (12:58pm) to locate, establish a water supply to the freeway location, and extinguish the burning dry grass on the shoulder at the interchange. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 CE83 E275 E298 E75 E81 T75 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
